heading: Medicine Bottles
content: The technology allows cost-effective production of high-quality and complicated shapes with minimal waste. You can also customize the design for patient convenience.

heading: Liquid Soaps & Detergents
content: With the ISBM technology, you gain better clarity of the quantity  that needs to be filled. The technology also enhances the overall strength of the container.

heading: Bottles with Conditioners
content: You can always perceive matchless and superior quality when the ISBM process enables you to produce bottles with consistent thickness.

heading: Liquor
content: The ISBM technology enables the production of liqour bottles with consistent wall thickness and in designs which can’t be accomplished through other processes.
